location: Pittsburgh Job Corps Center/Leech Farm Tuberculosis Hospital and Sanitarium
description: LEECH FAMILY FARM HOUSE  - Also known as the home of the former head of administration of the Pittsburgh Sanitarium -  Reports of seeing the HOA on his front porch and in the window, the windows however have since been boarded. And violent flashing lights from the seams of the open wood panels. The former HOA's family got TB and died, and he died of influenza shortly after.
